Typedef Documentation

◆ FormattedAlignment

claragenomics::cudaaligner::FormattedAlignment

Holds formatted strings representing an alignment. FormattedAlignment.first = formatted string for query FormattedAlignment.second = formatted string for target

Parameters
max_query_lengthMaximum length of query string
max_target_lengthMaximum length of target string
max_alignmentsMaximum number of alignments to be performed
